message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is too low.  Could you do $13,000?
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
